Traits.Name: Overdrive 3
Traits.Description: Deals boosted damage if the current round is 3 or higher.

Traits.Name: Slow
Traits.Description: Go after all other characters. If multiple characters take slow turns, it takes the same order as regular turns (ally/enemy/ally).

Traits.Name: Aetherwall
Traits.Description: Cover from ranged attacks further away than range 2.

Actions.Name: Lob
Actions.Hit: Deal light magic damage. Pierce, ignores cover, inflict blight.
Actions.Blightboost: Repeat the attack. The new attack does not have Blightboost.

Actions.Name: Fell Shot
Actions.Description: Mark 2 unoccupied spaces in range 8. Foes or allies that pass through these spaces take piercing fray magic damage as an area effect. At the start of the siegewright's turn, any spaces created by this ability disappear.

Actions.Name: Entrench
Actions.Description: Aetherwall grants damage immunity to ranged attacks instead of resistance. Ends if the wright moves, is shoved, dazed, staggered, or stunned.
